name: Balls at War
description:
Balls At War is a solo or cooperative third-person shooter. The playable characters are 'Countryballs' that have their own unique *cough* stereotyped *cough* weapons and apparel. The story is ridiculous, the mission is simple - vanquish your enemies. Featuring two game modes:

  • Horde-Mode (defend an objective) - Pirate Bay;
  • Seek-N-Kill (hunt down the enemy) - Space Station.
